enumMember.name: unblocked
enumMember.description: Unblock PDP to allocate IPv4 address from the specific range in shared IP pool

enumMember.name: blocked
enumMember.description: Block PDP to allocate IPv4 address from the specific range in shared IP pool

enumMember.name: gtpPrime
enumMember.description: Show GPRS Tunneling Protocol Prime statistics

enumMember.name: routingRedundancy
enumMember.description: Show Scalable Gi Routing Redundancy statistics per RI

enumMember.name: hspa
enumMember.description: High speed packet access evolution network

enumMember.name: eutran
enumMember.description: LTE/Evolved UMTS terrestrial radio access network

enumMember.name: unblocked
enumMember.description: Unblock PDP to allocate the IP address from the whole shared IP pool

enumMember.name: blocked
enumMember.description: Block PDP to allocate the IP address from the whole shared IP pool

enumMember.name: msisdn
enumMember.description: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network

enumMember.name: unblocked
enumMember.description: Unblock PDP to allocate IPv6 address from the specific range in shared IP pool

enumMember.name: blocked
enumMember.description: Block PDP to allocate IPv6 address from the specific range in shared IP pool

enumMember.name: apn-gateway-address
enumMember.description: Include gateway address in PCO message

enumMember.name: end-user-address
enumMember.description: Include end user address in PCO message

derivedDataType.name: AddressReuseTime
derivedDataType.description: Timeout for reuse of IP addresses, use 0 to disable address-reuse-time

derivedDataType.name: EchoInterval
derivedDataType.description: Specifies how often a echo request should be sent out on each path (in seconds)

derivedDataType.name: PoolName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string of 121 or fewer characters and may contain letters, numbers, decimals and dashes.

derivedDataType.name: CurrentHopLimit
derivedDataType.description: Value to be placed in current hop limit field

derivedDataType.name: MaximumInitialAdvertisements
derivedDataType.description: Maximum number of initial router advertisements

derivedDataType.name: Name
derivedDataType.description: Node identifier is a string consisting of up to 20 letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, and underscores

derivedDataType.name: PlmnId
derivedDataType.description: PLMN identifier is a string of 5 or 6 digits

derivedDataType.name: N3Requests
derivedDataType.description: Specifies the number of total attempts allowed for a control message

derivedDataType.name: ApnName
derivedDataType.description: Must be a string of 100 or fewer characters and may contain letters, numbers, decimals and dashes.

derivedDataType.name: RouterLifetime
derivedDataType.description: Value to be placed in router lifetime field

derivedDataType.name: SingletonNodeName
derivedDataType.description: Type of single node name, has to be equal to 1

derivedDataType.name: MaximumInitialInterval
derivedDataType.description: Maximum interval between initial router advertisements

derivedDataType.name: RangedString64
derivedDataType.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, underscores or dashes

derivedDataType.name: T3ResponseTime
derivedDataType.description: Specifies the time in seconds between control message retries

derivedDataType.name: ReachableTime
derivedDataType.description: Value to be placed in reachable time field

derivedDataType.name: EcimEmpty
derivedDataType.description: The empty built-in type represents a leaf that does not have any value, it conveys information by its presence or absence.

class.name: Pgw
class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert id='set' test='every $context in @gomRoutingInstance satisfies ($context = /ManagedElement/Context/@contextNameId)'><name path='.'/>,gomRoutingInstance: Routing instance must be configured under 'managed-element context'</assert> <assert id='set' test='exists(./Cpb/@cpbID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'cpb'</assert> <assert id='set' test='exists(./Ppb/@ppbID)'><name path='.'/>: Missing mandatory managed object 'ppb'</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

parameter.name: of
parameter.description: Statistics of

parameter.description: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network or Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

parameter.description: Show subscriber statistics for Identifier

parameter.description: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network or Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

parameter.name: identifierType

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Mobile Station Integrated Services Digital Network or Identifier for International Mobile Subscriber Identity

attribute.description: Enable credit control according to 3GPP (Ro) or CLCI

attribute.name: voipIm
attribute.description: Enable voice-over-IP instant messaging heuristic detection

attribute.name: vpnAtmVc
attribute.description: Enable VPN with transport on ATM VC

attribute.name: vpnGreIp
attribute.description: Enable VPN with transport on GRE and on IP-in-IP

attribute.description: Enable VPN with transport on VLAN

attribute.name: ipsecIkeOnAsp
attribute.description: Enable IPSec and IKE on ASP

attribute.name: greAndIpInIp
attribute.description: Enable GRE and IP-in-IP tunneling in ASP

attribute.name: vpnGreIpAtmVc
attribute.description: Enable VPN with transport on GRE and on IP-in-IP

attribute.name: policyChargingControl
attribute.description: Enable policy and charging control (PCC) over Gx

class.name: S2aPmip
